author: jsign
content:
hey, I wanted to share a PR just opened: https://github.com/eth-act/ere-guests/pull/7
It implements EIP-8025 current expectations for guest programs. For now, ere-guests supports Reth and Ethrex, but the important part is the guest api -- so sharing since might be useful for other ELs to skim the code a bit. I also wrote a long-ish PR description that can help get 80% of what is important without reading the code.
